title: Snow-covered Jyotirmath in Winter
description: A breathtaking view of the Jyotirmath premises covered in a thick blanket of snow during the winter months.

title: Shankaracharya Meeting Pilgrims at Badrinath
description: The Shankaracharya of Jyotirmath interacting with and blessing pilgrims visiting the holy shrine of Badrinath.

title: Ganga Aarti at the Foothills of the Himalayas
description: A vibrant Ganga Aarti ceremony being performed near Jyotirmath, with the majestic Himalayas in the background.
